tools

Class Vector2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.Vector2d

  • public class Vector2d
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a vector, or a position, in the map. PTSP-Competition Created by Diego Perez, University of Essex. Date: 19/12/11

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double x
      X-coordinate of the vector.
      double y
      Y-coordinate of the vector.
